about_the_game:
"Sculpturn" is an immersive psychological horror game that will plunge you into a realm of deep nightmares and uncharted horrors. In this unique experience, you find yourself in a chilling world crafted within the protagonist's mind. But beware – you're not only confronting the dark secrets of the past, but also a maniacal mannequin that pursues you whenever your gaze wavers.

The pursuit mechanic, where the mannequin starts moving when you look away, adds a layer of tension and unease. You'll need to cleverly utilize the environment to stay safe and maintain your focus on the ominous pursuer. Every step you take and decision you make holds significance, influencing the course of events and the development of the horrifying narrative.

In "Sculpturn," the lines between reality and nightmares blur, immersing you in the dark recesses of the protagonist's mind. You'll encounter enigmatic puzzles, uncover ghastly secrets, and explore their inner world to survive and decipher puzzles born from their own fears.

Prepare for a deep dive into the unsettling world of "Sculpturn," where reality and terrifying fantasies intertwine in a dangerous game of the mind.
